title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 §§ 753-1.1 - Purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 §§ 753-1.1 - Purpose

State Regulations

The purpose of these rules is to establish procedures for
the protection of underground facilities in order to assure public safety and
to prevent damage to public and private property, as required by General

Business Law, article 36 and Public Service Law, section 119-b. T his Part may
be cited as Industrial Code 53 or Code Rule 53, in addition to its designation
as Part 753. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
§§
753-1.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
